hanzi-su-wiki:
斬

Значения

Резать, отрубать

Мнемоника

Четвертование на колесе телеги 車 с последовательным отрубанием членов топором 斤.

Варианты

斩
purpleculture_pinyin:
zhǎn
to behead (as form of capital punishment); to chop
обезглавить (как форма высшей меры наказания); мелко нарезать
rtega_mnemonic:
斬斬RS
斩斩		cut, chop, sever, behead
  • RS. the cutting of cart wheels 車 by axe 斤 being a common trade in old China
  • chop off a head with an axe 斤 so it rolls away like a wheel 車
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 斩)
Pictophonetic: 車 indicates the sound; 斤 (axe) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
斬首 [ zhǎn shǒu ]: to behead
斬釘截鐵 [ zhǎn dīng jié tiě ]: lit. to chop the nail and slice the iron (idiom); fig. resolute and decisive; unhesitating; categorical
斬斷 [ zhǎn duàn ]: to cut off; to chop sth in half
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 車 [ chē ] cart, vehicle; to move in a cart
    • 斤 [ jīn ] a catty (about 500 grams); an axe; keen, shrewd
heisig_chinese_memo: I wanted a convertible so I hewed (chopped) off the top of my car with an axe.
koohiiStory1: A "chop shop" is a place where stolen cars are taken, and parts chopped off with an axe, to be sold.
koohiiStory2: I wanted a convertible so I chopped off the top of my car with an axe.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You use your car and an axe to slice down a pedestrian. This innocent guy is just walking along the road when you drive up to him in your car and axe him to death with your axe. You’re all like, VROOM! AXE! Now this guy is dead because you sliced him down in cold blood.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine driving your car, waving your axe out the window and slicing this guy down. Hear his scream ring in your ears as you slice, slice, SLICE.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You were driving around in Zanzibar (ざん) when you sliced down this man. Luckily, Zanzibar has no laws at all, so you won’t get arrested for slicing down this guy with your axe.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Zanzibar is a crazy place, huh? Continue to drive around Zanzibar as you wave your axe out your car window looking for another victim to slice.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: an axe (斤) in the car (車) would kill it
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: To hew something is to chop it like when trying to free someone from a car with an axe.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " car " from " jin ". The original meaning is to cut people off with an axe. "Shuowen" thinks that " cutting " is to imitate the punishment of car cracking, so the font is from " car ". The original meaning of " jin " is an axe, which means the axe used to cut people. "Said Wen": "Cut, 𢧵 also. From the car from the cat. The method of cutting and cracking the car." Duan Yucai's note: "The one who is 𢧵, the broken also. [...] Gaigu used the car to crack. And with 鈇钺, so the word is also from the car. Jin is, 鈇yue and the like." There is already the word " Zhan " in the bronze inscriptions, see in Bogui: "Bai (Bo) Zha (made) Zhan Pan Bao [尊阝] (Zun) Yi." " Sa " is a person's name, and "Zhan San" means to kill San. " Cut " means hacking and killing is another example of the Qin Bamboo Slips "The Eighteen Kinds of Laws of Qin" Jian 155: "Lichen beheaded as a servant." "Lichen" is a prisoner who has been sentenced to a crime, and "Shi" is the first rank of the twentieth class. Officials beheaded the enemy's head on the battlefield, and can be awarded the first rank.

" Cut " also refers to cut off. Such as "Mozi. "Feixia": "Entering the border of the country, slashing its crops, cutting down its trees." "Huainanzi. "Shize": "It's the moon, the trees are flourishing, don't dare to chop down."

" Cut " means sever. Such as "Poetry. Xiaoya. "Jie Nanshan": "The country is dead and cut, why not supervise it." Zhu Xi's note: "To cut, absolutely." Another example is "Mencius. Li Lou Xia": "The Ze of Gentlemen will be cut for the fifth generation."

" Cut " also means tailoring, especially the mourning garment without sewing the bottom. "Guang Ya. Interpretation II: "Cut, cut also." Such as "Zuo Zhuan. The Seventeenth Year of Xianggong": "Qi Yan Huanzi died, Yan Ying cut rough." Du's note: "Cut, don't want it."
humanum_short_description_en: From " car " from " jin ". The original meaning is to cut people off with an axe.
humanum_full_description:
從「車」從「斤」。本義是用斧鉞把人砍斷。《說文》以為「斬」是效法車裂之刑而來，故字形從「車」。「斤」的本義是斧頭，表示砍人所使用的斧鉞。《說文》：「斬，𢧵也。从車从斤。斬法車裂也。」段玉裁注：「𢧵者，斷也。[……]蓋古用車裂，後人乃法車裂之意而用鈇鉞，故字亦从車。斤者，鈇鉞之類也。」金文已有「斬」字，見於伯簋：「白（伯）乍（作）斬皿寶[尊阝]（尊）彝。」「皿」是人名，「斬皿」即砍殺皿這個人。「斬」表示砍殺的例子又如睡虎地秦簡《秦律十八種》簡155：「隸臣斬首為公士。」「隸臣」是犯罪被判處刑罰的刑徒，而「公士」是二十等爵的第一級。隸臣在戰場上斬殺敵人首級，可授第一級爵位。

　　「斬」又泛指砍斷。如《墨子．非攻下》：「入其國家邊境，芟刈其禾稼，斬其樹木。」《淮南子．時則》：「是月也，樹木方盛，勿敢斬伐。」

　　「斬」表示斷絕。如《詩．小雅．節南山》：「國既卒斬，何用不監。」朱熹注：「斬，絕。」又如《孟子．離婁下》：「君子之澤，五世而斬。」

　　「斬」還表示剪裁，特指喪服不縫下邊。《廣雅．釋詁二》：「斬，裁也。」如《左傳．襄公十七年》：「齊晏桓子卒，晏嬰麤縗斬。」杜預注：「斬，不緝之也。」
humanum_short_description: 從「車」從「斤」。本義是用斧鉞把人砍斷。

斬る(きる): murder, behead

從「 車 」從「 斤 」。本義是用斧鉞把人砍斷。《說文》以為「 斬 」是效法車裂之刑而來，故字形從「 車 」。「 斤 」的本義是斧頭，表示砍人所使用的斧鉞。《說文》：「斬，𢧵也。从車从斤。斬法車裂也。」段玉裁注：「𢧵者，斷也。[……]蓋古用車裂，後人乃法車裂之意而用鈇鉞，故字亦从車。斤者，鈇鉞之類也。」金文已有「 斬 」字，見於伯簋：「白（伯）乍（作）斬皿寶[尊阝]（尊）彝。」「 皿 」是人名，「斬皿」即砍殺皿這個人。「 斬 」表示砍殺的例子又如睡虎地秦簡《秦律十八種》簡155：「隸臣斬首為公士。」「隸臣」是犯罪被判處刑罰的刑徒，而「公士」是二十等爵的第一級。隸臣在戰場上斬殺敵人首級，可授第一級爵位。 「 斬 」又泛指砍斷。如《墨子．非攻下》：「入其國家邊境，芟刈其禾稼，斬其樹木。」《淮南子．時則》：「是月也，樹木方盛，勿敢斬伐。」 「 斬 」表示斷絕。如《詩．小雅．節南山》：「國既卒斬，何用不監。」朱熹注：「斬，絕。」又如《孟子．離婁下》：「君子之澤，五世而斬。」 「 斬 」還表示剪裁，特指喪服不縫下邊。《廣雅．釋詁二》：「斬，裁也。」如《左傳．襄公十七年》：「齊晏桓子卒，晏嬰麤縗斬。」杜預注：「斬，不緝之也。」
From " car" from " jin". The original meaning is to cut people off with an axe. "Shuowen" thinks that " cutting" is to imitate the punishment of car cracking, so the font is from " car". The original meaning of " jin" is an axe, which means the axe used to cut people. "Said Wen": "Cut, 𢧵 also. From the car from the cat. The method of cutting and cracking the car." Duan Yucai's note: "The one who is 𢧵, the broken also. [...] Gaigu used the car to crack. And with 鈇钺, so the word is also from the car. Jin is, 鈇yue and the like." There is already the word " Zhan" in the bronze inscriptions, see in Bogui: "Bai (Bo) Zha (made) Zhan Pan Bao [尊阝] (Zun) Yi." " Sa" is a person's name, and "Zhan San" means to kill San. " Cut" means hacking and killing is another example of the Qin Bamboo Slips "The Eighteen Kinds of Laws of Qin" Jian 155: "Lichen beheaded as a servant." "Lichen" is a prisoner who has been sentenced to a crime, and "Shi" is the first rank of the twentieth class. Officials beheaded the enemy's head on the battlefield, and can be awarded the first rank. " Cut" also refers to cut off. Such as "Mozi. "Feixia": "Entering the border of the country, slashing its crops, cutting down its trees." "Huainanzi. "Shize": "It's the moon, the trees are flourishing, don't dare to chop down." " Cut" means sever. Such as "Poetry. Xiaoya. "Jie Nanshan": "The country is dead and cut, why not supervise it." Zhu Xi's note: "To cut, absolutely." Another example is "Mencius. Li Lou Xia": "The Ze of Gentlemen will be cut for the fifth generation." " Cut" also means tailoring, especially the mourning garment without sewing the bottom. "Guang Ya. Interpretation II: "Cut, cut also." Such as "Zuo Zhuan. The Seventeenth Year of Xianggong": "Qi Yan Huanzi died, Yan Ying cut rough." Du's note: "Cut, don't want it."

斬字的基本解释

斬
zhǎn
见“斩”。

斬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhǎn］
［《廣韻》側減切，上豏，莊。］
“斩1”的繁体字。
(1)古代刑罚之一。本谓车裂，后谓斩首或腰斩。
(2)砍断；砍。
(3)断绝。
(4)讨伐，攻打。
(5)砍伐；开辟。
(6)剪裁。特指丧服不缝衣旁和下边。
(7)哀痛。参见“斬焉”。
(8)同“眨”。
(9)通“塹”。挖掘。
(10)通“儳”。不齐貌。
[②]［zhàn］
［《集韻》莊陷切，去陷，莊。］
“斩2”的繁体字。
沾。

斬字的康熙字典解释

【卯集下】【斤字部】　斬； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页479第18
【唐韻】【正韻】側減切【集韻】【韻會】阻減切，?音蔪。【說文】截也。从車从斤。斬法車列也。【博雅】裁也。【釋文】斬，暫也。暫加兵，卽斷也。【爾雅·釋詁】斬，殺也。【詩·小雅】斬伐四國。【周禮·秋官·掌戮】掌斬殺賊諜而搏之。　又【杜甫詩】斬新花蕊未應飛。【註】禪家有斬新日月之語。　又【集韻】莊陷切，音蘸。芟也。

斬字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
斬字的起名意思

暂无。

cut
Basic explanation of words
cut
zhǎn
See "Cut".
cut
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhǎn］
["Guangyun" cut sideways, go up, Zhuang. ]
The traditional characters of "切1".
(1) One of the ancient penalties. Originally called car crack, later called beheaded or cut in half.
(2) Cut off; cut.
(3) Cut off.
(4) Crusade, attack.
(5) Felling; opening up.
(6) Tailoring. Especially refers to the side and bottom of the mourning dress without sewing.
(7) Grief. See "Zhan Yan".
(8) Same as "blink".
(9) Through "grain". Dig.
(10) Through "儳". Uneven appearance.
[②]［zhàn］
["Ji Yun" Zhuang trapped and cut, go trapped, Zhuang. ]
The traditional characters of "切2".
Dip.
cut
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Jixia] [Jin Zi Department] 　切; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 479 Page 18
[Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Side reduction and cutting [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Resistance reduction and cutting,? Yin Su. [Said the text] also cut off. From the car from the catty. Chop the cars. [Bo Ya] Cut too. [Explanation] Cut, for the time being. Temporarily add troops, but also cut off. [Erya·Shu Xuan] Cut, kill. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Cut down the Four Kingdoms. 【Zhou Li·Qiuguan·Slap Slay】The palm kills the thief and fights with it.　[Du Fu Poetry] The new stamens have not been cut yet to fly. [Note] The Zen family has the language of cutting the sun and the moon.　 [Ji Yun] Zhuang trapped and cut, sound dip.芟 also.

Radicals: 車, 斤  (car, axe)
Meaning Mnemonic
You use your car and an axe to slice down a pedestrian. This innocent guy is just walking along the road when you drive up to him in your car and axe him to death with your axe. You’re all like, VROOM! AXE! Now this guy is dead because you sliced him down in cold blood.
Imagine driving your car, waving your axe out the window and slicing this guy down. Hear his scream ring in your ears as you slice, slice, SLICE.
Reading Mnemonic
You were driving around in Zanzibar (ざん) when you sliced down this man. Luckily, Zanzibar has no laws at all, so you won’t get arrested for slicing down this guy with your axe.
Zanzibar is a crazy place, huh? Continue to drive around Zanzibar as you wave your axe out your car window looking for another victim to slice.

Examples: 斬る (き.る)
斤 (катти), 車 (автомобиль)
